m_szDocTitle: Rich Electric-Car Buyers In CA Face Mid-March Deadline For Rebates
m_szDocSumamry: Rich Electric-Car Buyers In CA Face Mid-March Deadline For Rebates Email This Page To (separate emails with commas) Message (optional) Your email was sent successfully. Close 2,662 views Jan 6, 2016 Tesla Store opening in Westfield Mall, London, Oct 2013 Enlarge Photo Cash incentives offer an important way to encourage electric-car adoption, and California has one of the more generous programs. A $2,500 rebate for new battery-electric cars and a $1,500 rebate for plug-in hybrids have helped grow the number of electric cars on the state's roads.
